title: How to Share Your Pictures on SmugMug

steps.headline: Enter your Email, Password, and desired Site Name.
Enter a name for your online gallery.
Select a category to help others find the photos you make public.
Set the privacy preferences for your gallery including whether its public, unlisted, or completely private.
Drag the pictures you want to share from your computer to the “Drop ‘em here” icon.
steps.description: Alternatively, click “Browse” to select a file from your computer.

steps.headline: Select the image within your newly created gallery.
Click the “Share” tab and select how you wish to share your photo.

text:
Visit the SmugMug website. Click “Try Us Out”. Enter your Email, Password, and desired Site Name. Click “Create”. Enter a name for your online gallery. Select a category to help others find the photos you make public. Select a theme. Choose thumbnail layout. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/9/95/Share-Your-Pictures-on-Smugmug-Step-8.jpg","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/9/95/Share-Your-Pictures-on-Smugmug-Step-8.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570,"licensing":"

"} Click “Save”. Drag the pictures you want to share from your computer to the “Drop ‘em here” icon. Alternatively, click “Browse” to select a file from your computer. Click “I’m Done Uploading”.
